name: Teddy Bear
description: This gorgeous, honey brown Bear hat: 1) Is made from soffttt, lushhh, luxurious, faux fur. 2) Is super warm & cuddly! 3) Is completely machine washable. 4) Is the perfect accessory to the stylish child's or adult's wardrobe. 5) Does double duty as a fun dress-up item! 6) Is handmade-to-order in the USA! To Measure Hat Size: Measure the circumference of the widest part of the head (just above the eyebrows) using a flexible tape measure or a piece of string and a ruler. Sizes: Xsmall 20", Small 21", Medium 22", Large 23", Xlarge 24". Contact Us with questions.

name: Panda Bear
description: This gorgeous couture, Panda Hat: 1) Is made from soffttt, lushhh, luxurious, black & white faux fur. 2) Is super warm & cuddly! 3) Looks absolutely fabulous on EVERYONE regardless of size, shape or age! 4) Is the perfect accessory to the stylish child or adult's wardrobe. 5) Is completely machine washable. 6) Does double duty as a fun dress-up item! 7) Is handmade-to-order in the USA! To Measure Hat Size: Measure the circumference of the widest part of the head (just above the eyebrows) using a flexible tape measure or a piece of string and a ruler. Sizes: Xsmall 20", Small 21", Medium 22", Large 23", Xlarge 24". Contact Us with questions.
